name: Autonomous SmartDesk Pro
description: Premium electric standing desk with dual-motor system and 4 programmable height presets. Features 53x29 inch solid top, 220lb capacity, whisper-quiet operation, and cable management tray.

reviews.review_text: Game changer for my back pain. Smooth and quiet transitions.
Build quality is excellent. Handles all my monitors.
Assembly took a while but instructions were clear.
